member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.AngularModuleNameAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the name of the Angular module with which this controller will be associated.

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.AngularModuleNameAttribute.ModuleName
member.summary: The module name.

member.name: M:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.AngularModuleNameAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new AngularModuleNameAttribute.

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.AngularRouteIdParameterAttribute
member.summary: Indicates the Angular route parameter that should be used as an ID when communicating with this controller's GET methods.

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.AngularRouteIdParameterAttribute.ParameterName
member.summary: Name of the parameter, as stored in UI-Router parameters dictionary.

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.AngularRouteIdParameterAttribute.IsNullable
member.summary: ID can be null. Null IDs represent new records whereas filled-in ones represent existing records.

member.name: M:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.AngularRouteIdParameterAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new AngularRouteIdParameterAttribute.
member.param: Name of the parameter, as stored in UI-Router parameters dictionary.

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.DefaultClientObjectDefinitionAttribute
member.summary: When used on methods of a WebAPI controller allowing nullable parameters for the $stateParams property (i.e., dual-use pages supporting both "save new" and "edit" functionality), this attribute allows a backup, default object definitoin for methods if the client-side paremter is null.

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.DefaultClientObjectDefinitionAttribute.Definition
member.summary: The definition, in JavaScript, of the default object. If no Definition is defined, the default definition is ```{}```.

member.name: M:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.DefaultClientObjectDefinitionAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a new DefaultClientObjectDefinitionAttribute
member.param: The definition, in JavaScript, of the default object. If no Definition is defined, the default definition is ```{}```.

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.GenerateResourceOnlyAttribute
member.summary: If this attribute is applied, the generation will not consider the method when generating controllers or views.

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.InjectAngularServicesAttribute
member.summary: Include Angular services in addition to the default services.

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.InjectAngularServicesAttribute.Services
member.summary: Additional services to inject

member.name: M:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.InjectAngularServicesAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a nwe InjectAngularServicesAttribute.
member.param: A comma-separated list of additional services.

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.InjectJavaScriptAttribute
member.summary: When placed on a WebAPI controller, allows the injection of raw JavaScript into the generated AngularJS controller.

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.InjectJavaScriptAttribute.Content
member.summary: The JavaScript statement to be executed.

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.InjectJavaScriptAttribute.ControllerPosition
member.summary: The position in which to inject the JavaScript statement

member.name: M:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.InjectJavaScriptAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new InjectJavaScript attribute

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.InjectJavaScriptAttribute.Position
member.summary: The position in which to inject the JavaScript statement. If not specified, the end position is used.

member.name: F:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.InjectJavaScriptAttribute.Position.Beginning
member.summary: Right after the function signature declaration

member.name: F:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.InjectJavaScriptAttribute.Position.AfterInitialization
member.summary: After all initialization is complete but before any server endpoints are called.

member.name: F:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.InjectJavaScriptAttribute.Position.AfterGet
member.summary: After all GET methods to retrieve data on the current page are called but before methods referring to the POST endpoints are declared.

member.name: F:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.InjectJavaScriptAttribute.Position.End
member.summary: At the end of the function

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.JavaScriptOnPostCompleteAttribute
member.summary: Allows the embedding of javascript into generated controllers. ContextType determines if the code should be injected into the success or failure handlers.
member.remarks: Only supported for HTTP POST methods.

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.JavaScriptOnPostCompleteAttribute.Expression
member.summary: The body of the JavaScript statement to be run.

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.JavaScriptOnPostCompleteAttribute.Context
member.summary: Determines whether this statement should be injected into the success or failure handler.

member.name: M:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.JavaScriptOnPostCompleteAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a new JavaScriptOnPostCompleteAttribute.

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.JavaScriptOnPostCompleteAttribute.ContextType
member.summary: Determines which handler the statement will be inserted into.

member.name: F:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.JavaScriptOnPostCompleteAttribute.ContextType.Success
member.summary: The on success handler

member.name: F:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.JavaScriptOnPostCompleteAttribute.ContextType.Failure
member.summary: The on failure handler

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.SuccessStateOnPostCompleteAttribute
member.summary: Transition to a different UI router state on success. JavaScript embedded via JavaScriptOnPostCompleteAttribute

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.SuccessStateOnPostCompleteAttribute.RouteParameters
member.summary: If specified, will be used as the body of the route parameters passed to the $state service.

member.name: M:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.SuccessStateOnPostCompleteAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a new SuccessStateOnPostCompleteAttribute.

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.PresentAsViewOnlyDataAttribute
member.summary: All data presented by this controller should be presented in a view-only format
member.remarks: This is applied to a controller. NOT a view model! A controller!

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.UseAngularGlobalCacheAttribute
member.summary: Indicates Angular resource services accessing this controller should use a global cache. Use this option if the data changes very infrequently; the cache will not be invalidated unless the user refreshes the whole page.

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Angular.UseAngularLocalCacheAttribute
member.summary: Indicates an Angular cache should be used for Angular resource services interacting with this controller, but invalidated with each call to a POST method. The cache will be local to this controller and not shared with others.

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.AngularControllerActionSectionHeaderAttribute
member.summary: Indicates the view generated based on this controller method should have the header specified.
member.remarks: This attribute is intended to be applied directly to the get methods of a controller (or POST methods in the case of POST-only types).

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.AngularControllerActionSectionHeaderAttribute.Header
member.summary: The text of the header

member.name: M:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.AngularControllerActionSectionHeaderAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.CollectionEditorAttribute
member.summary: Controls the type of HTML editor to be used for a collection of complex objects.

member.name: M:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.CollectionEditorAttribute.#ctor(Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.CollectionEditorAttribute.EditorType)
member.summary: Create a new CollectionEditorAttribute.
member.param: The type of editor to be used.

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.CollectionEditorAttribute.DefaultObjectDefinitionJson
member.summary: If defined, this JSON is used to hydrate objects when the user elects to add a new object.

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.CollectionEditorAttribute.EditorType
member.summary: Type of editor control to use.

member.name: F:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.CollectionEditorAttribute.EditorType.Simple
member.summary: The simple editor, which displays all fields of all members of the collection

member.name: F:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.CollectionEditorAttribute.EditorType.Complex
member.summary: The complex editor, which uses a table to show all primitive fields of all members and a form showing a single, selected member for editing

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.CollectionEditorAttribute.Editor
member.summary: The editor to be used.

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.FieldWidthAttribute
member.summary: Controls the width in Bootstrap columns of a field within HTML rows.

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.FieldWidthAttribute.Twelfths
member.summary: Twelfths of the row to be used.

member.name: M:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.FieldWidthAttribute.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new FieldWidthAttribute.
member.param: The number of Bootstrap columns the field is to occupy

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.InjectHtmlInViewAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a GET method of a WebAPI controller, this attribute allows the injection of arbitrary HTML into the generated view. For longer includes, the ng-include attribute is recommended.

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.InjectHtmlInViewAttribute.HtmlPosition
member.summary: Position to insert HTML. By default, after content.

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.InjectHtmlInViewAttribute.Content
member.summary: HTML to be injected

member.name: M:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.InjectHtmlInViewAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a new InsertHtmlInViewAttribute

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.InjectHtmlInViewAttribute.Position
member.summary: Position to insert HTML

member.name: F:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.InjectHtmlInViewAttribute.Position.BeforeHeader
member.summary: Before the header generated by this method

member.name: F:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.InjectHtmlInViewAttribute.Position.AfterHeader
member.summary: After the header for the section generated by this method

member.name: F:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.InjectHtmlInViewAttribute.Position.InsideFormAtBeginning
member.summary: Immediately after the <form> tag.

member.name: F:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.InjectHtmlInViewAttribute.Position.BeforeSaveButtons
member.summary: Before the save buttons at the bottom of the form.

member.name: F:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.InjectHtmlInViewAttribute.Position.InsideFormAtEnd
member.summary: Immediately before the </form> tag.

member.name: F:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.InjectHtmlInViewAttribute.Position.AfterContent
member.summary: After the section generated by this method

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.FormHtmlAttributeAttribute
member.summary: Decorates a generated form element with the attribute (and optional value)
member.remarks: This is intended to be applied to a controller method. The attribute (and optional value) declared here will be added to the form tag generated for the declaring method.

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.FormHtmlAttributeAttribute.HtmlAttributeName
member.summary: The name of the HTML attribute (such as style, required, or ng-show)

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.FormHtmlAttributeAttribute.HtmlAttributeValue
member.summary: The value of the HTML attribute.

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.SectionHtmlAttributeAttribute
member.summary: Indicates the div enclosing a section should have the HTML attribute and value for the attribute specified.
member.remarks: This is intended to be applied directly to the view model class.

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.SectionHtmlAttributeAttribute.SectionName
member.summary: The section to which the rule is applied.
member.remarks: If no field in this class declares a referring to this section the rule will not be applied.

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.SectionHtmlAttributeAttribute.HtmlAttributeName
member.summary: The name of the HTML attribute (such as style, required, or ng-show)

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.Html.SectionHtmlAttributeAttribute.HtmlAttributeValue
member.summary: The value of the HTML attribute.

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.BoolLabelAttribute
member.summary: Allows customization of the labels of yes and no elements of boolean controls.

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.BoolLabelAttribute.YesLabelText
member.summary: The text to show for the "yes" or true label. Default value is "Yes."

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.BoolLabelAttribute.NoLabelText
member.summary: Text to show for the "no" or false label. Default value is "no."

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.CapAttribute
member.summary: Allows definition of input group "caps" (such as a dollar sign before a field).

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.CapAttribute.StartCap
member.summary: Text to appear before the field.

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.CapAttribute.EndCap
member.summary: Text to appear after the field.

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.ExcludeFromComplexCollectionEditorTableAttribute
member.summary: If this attribute is defined, the property will be excluded from the summary table used by the complex collection editor.

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.DocumentTypeSourceProviderAttribute
member.summary: When provided on collection of objects, defines the expression used to supply file types. If blank this field will not be shown.

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.DocumentTypeSourceProviderAttribute.Expression
member.summary: Body of expression to be used to retrieve document types

member.name: M:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.DocumentTypeSourceProviderAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Instantiate a new
member.param: Body of expression to be used to retrieve document types

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.SaveButtonTextAttribute
member.summary: Replaces the default "Save changes to modelname" text with custom save text

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.SaveButtonTextAttribute.Text
member.summary: The text of the save button

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.SaveButtonTextAttribute.Glyphicon
member.summary: Glyphicon to use for save button. Default value is "glyphicon-floppy-save".

member.name: M:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.SaveButtonTextAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Instantiate a new

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.SubordinateItemActionAttribute
member.summary: Supports invocation of custom targets (states and functions)... When placed on a an IEnumerable<...ViewModel> propery, this attribute will result in an area element placed as the last field of each record (item).

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.SubordinateItemActionAttribute.ColumnHeadingText
member.summary: the column heading for the action column

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.SubordinateItemActionAttribute.AttributeName
member.summary: The attribute for the inserted area element; examples are ng-click or ui-sref. The default is value is: "ui-sref".

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.SubordinateItemActionAttribute.AttributeValue
member.summary: The value assigned to the attribute identified in AttributeName this would typically be the target state for AttributeName="ui-sref" or the function reference for AttributeName="ng-click"

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.SubordinateItemActionAttribute.AreaClass
member.summary: The class attribute value for the area containing the Attribute name/value pair The default value is: "btn btn-primary"

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.SubordinateItemActionAttribute.ActionText
member.summary: A text string (becomes the button label or link label) to be used on the item

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.SubordinateItemActionAttribute.ActionClass
member.summary: The class attribute to be associated with the ActionText. The default value is: "glyphicon glyphicon-arrow-right"

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.SubordinateItemActionAttribute.DoNotEscapeAngularBraces
member.summary: If true, Angular-style braces in the values of the fields will not be escaped, causing the values to be executed in the whole-page context. By default, this is off and such references will run in the context of the individual item. Note that setting this value on any subordinate action will make it apply to all subordinate actions applied to the same entity.

member.name: M:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.SubordinateItemActionAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: when placed on a an IEnumerable<...ViewModel> propery, this attribute will result in an area element placed as the last field of each record (item)
member.param: The action text value. See property description for more.

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.LedgerAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the collection should be displayed in a ledger table (for financial information).

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.LedgerAttribute.SumPropertyName
member.summary: This property will be summed to produce the current value.

member.name: M:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.LedgerAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new
member.param: This property will be summed to produce the current value.

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.DefaultSortAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the property should be the default method of sorting when the view model is used in a table.

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.DoNotShowAttribute
member.summary: Indicates user should not be shown the value of this property.
member.remarks: While there is already a which serves much the same purpose, it's MVC-specific and requires a reference to MVC. Furthermore, I ran into issues with MVC versions being out-of-sync, causing it not to be detected. Using this custom attribute instead is my fix.

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.InputMaskAttribute
member.summary: Indicates user should be provided with input mask when entering information
member.remarks: Value entered here is fed to ui-mask

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.NotUserEditableAttribute
member.summary: The user may not edit this field or view model from the UI.

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.SelectCommonAttribute
member.summary: Property maps to the key of a common record

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.SelectCommonAttribute.ProviderExpression
member.summary: Function to resolve the values of this common record

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.SelectCommonAttribute.CommonInformationName
member.summary: The name of the common records

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.SelectCommonAttribute.ObjectName
member.summary: The name of the object attached to the $scope which will be looked up for values.

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.SelectCommonAttribute.Index
member.summary: If the common record is a dictionary, this field specifies the value that will be used as its key.

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.SelectCommonAttribute.RestrictUntilResolved
member.summary: if true, the generated control will be attributed with ng-readonly="(!common.{commonInformationName}.$resolved)" further, any subordinate controls will be ng-readonly until such time as a value is selected on the 'parent' - that is to say that if the Index property is not empty then the ng-readonly attribute will also contain "|| (!common.{commonInformationName}[{Index}])"

member.name: P:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.SelectCommonAttribute.UseFilter
member.summary: If true, a searchable, filtered dropdown list will be used in lieu of the ordinary dropdown.

member.name: M:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.SelectCommonAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Generates a new SelectCommonAttribute
member.param: The name of the common records

member.name: T:Nord.Nganga.Annotations.Attributes.ViewModels.UiSectionAttribute
member.summary: Indicates this field should be treated as part of a particular section
